channel.title: Ip keeps changing
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I was wondering if there was a way to host a wireless broadband server. The only problem in every time i setup the pc the ip for my internet chnages so thtas hwo i get through ip bans. :P Anyway can i still host a server if my ip chnages everytime i start my pc?
All help is appreciated.
Thanx! :)

item.title: Ip keeps changing
item.dc:creator: @stevo08 stevo08
item.description:
@stevo08 wrote:

the reason why its probably resetting/changing everythime you login is most likely because you probably tuen your router off everytime you turn your pc off…tourning your routher off for more than 30 sec’s will reset your ip meaning you have to change ip on your dns…if you dont ever turn your routher off then i dont know what to suggest but i hope i have helped !

Read full topic
